mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ad_advertiser_aduit_logs ( advertiser_id, dsp_advertiser_id, category, advertiser_credentials_id, credential_id, credential_name, aduit_status, last_aduit_status, reason, operator_id, operator_name, create_time ) VALUES
( #{item.advertiserId}, #{item.dspAdvertiserId}, #{item.category}, #{item.advertiserCredentialsId}, #{item.credentialId}, #{item.credentialName}, #{item.aduitStatus}, #{item.lastAduitStatus}, #{item.reason}, #{item.operatorId}, #{item.operatorName}, #{item.createTime} )
